comments.creator: iannbugzilla@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: It seems to work but I suspect it will get the global now from somewhere else. Also declared in help and sidebar. There are numerous calls in mailnews still using RDF. If we want to rip it out in the first place we probably need to inspect/change each call. Check also for similar sRDF.
comments.creator: frgrahl@gmx.net
comments.author: frgrahl@gmx.net
comments.text:
Comment on attachment 9102758
Updated removal patch

It seems to work but I suspect it will get the global now from somewhere else. Also declared in help and sidebar. There are numerous calls in mailnews still using RDF. If we want to rip it out in the first place we probably need to inspect/change each call. Check also for similar sRDF.
